book-reader.title: Case studies
book-reader.details:
Convenient and practical mobile application for reading books

Admin panel + Mobile application

amhora.details:
Amhora is a Blockchain explorer.

The site was created so that users can view infographics on cryptocurrencies (blocks, transactions, prices and historical data).

Major cryptocurrencies: BTC, ETH, BCH, DASH, XRM, LTC.

jelly.details:
It's a chrome extention wallet for defichain network.

You can use the extension format or full screen.

Now project is on active development stage. Currently undergoing open testing on real users.

The extension format / full screen

bitalo.details:
It's a crypto wallet (exchange).

The peculiarity of the project is that administration does not have access to users' coins.

The essence of the work is based on the escrow base. The exchange is the guarantor for exchanges.

Clients can use web site or mobile application. Bitalo is audited by BaFin.

about-team.name: The name of our company speaks for itself - we are looking for the optimal solution to all problems and issues.
about-team.ideas: Our team of experts turn ideas into reality. From the process of creating logo prototypes to promoting the finished product on social networks.
about-team.products: We worked with small and medium businesses that needed products for various areas - fintech, cryptocurrencies, video games, promotional videos, and more.

about-us.comment: ‟Our main strength is a flexibility. We quickly adapt to customer need.”
